meanings.definition: Having a body type characterized by a tendency to gain weight easily.
meanings.sent1: She struggled with her endomorphic body type when trying to lose weight.
meanings.sent2: His endomorphic build made it challenging for him to stay slim.
meanings.sent3: Despite his endomorphic nature, he still enjoyed indulging in desserts occasionally.
meanings.sent4: Her endomorphic figure seemed to defy all efforts to slim down.
meanings.sent5: The endomorphic shape of the cake was irresistible to those with a sweet tooth.
